mapper.sql: maintenanceappid, serviceid, kehuid, empid, xiangmuid, cailiaoid, mendianid, carid , appno, mainorder, mainorderstuta, yujiallmony, yujisetcar, yujisetcartime, kehudepict, shiyucause, beizhu
e_Id, s_id, p_id, d_id, Sex, Name, LoginID, Phone, UpdateTime, UpdateName, DeleteTime, DeleteName, timeliness, CreateUserName, addTime
mapper.select: select mainbillingid, serviceid, maintenanceappid, kehuid, empid, xiangmuid, cailiaoid, mendianid, empids, paigongsta, mainbillingno, mainorder, mainorderstuta, yujisetcar, yujisetcartime, kehudepict, suichewup, wangongsta, wangongtime, favourable, yujiallmony, overmonytime, orfanxiu, beizhu from asms.mainbilling where mainbillingid = #{mainbillingid}

select , , , , , , , ,
from mainbilling mai inner join service se on ma.serviceid = se.serviceid inner join customer cu on ma.kehuid = cu.c_id inner join emp em on ma.empid = em.e_Id inner join projectsettings pr on ma.xiangmuid = pr.p_id inner join commodity co on ma.cailiaoid = co.co_id inner join store st on ma.mendianid = st.s_id inner join carmanagement ca on ma.carid = ca.carmagid inner join maintenanceapp mat on ma.maintenanceappid = mat.maintenanceappid where cu.c_name like CONCAT('%' ,#{c_name , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into asms.mainbilling(serviceid, maintenanceappid, kehuid, empid, xiangmuid, cailiaoid, mendianid, empids, paigongsta, mainbillingno, mainorder, mainorderstuta, yujisetcar, yujisetcartime, kehudepict, suichewup, wangongsta, wangongtime, favourable, yujiallmony, overmonytime, orfanxiu, beizhu) values (#{serviceid}, #{maintenanceappid}, #{kehuid}, #{empid}, #{xiangmuid}, #{cailiaoid}, #{mendianid}, #{empids}, #{paigongsta}, #{mainbillingno}, #{mainorder}, #{mainorderstuta}, #{yujisetcar}, #{yujisetcartime}, #{kehudepict}, #{suichewup}, #{wangongsta}, #{wangongtime}, #{favourable}, #{yujiallmony}, #{overmonytime}, #{orfanxiu}, #{beizhu})
mapper.update:
update asms.mainbilling
serviceid = #{serviceid},
maintenanceappid = #{maintenanceappid},
kehuid = #{kehuid},
empid = #{empid},
xiangmuid = #{xiangmuid},
cailiaoid = #{cailiaoid},
mendianid = #{mendianid},
empids = #{empids},
paigongsta = #{paigongsta},
mainbillingno = #{mainbillingno},
mainorder = #{mainorder},
mainorderstuta = #{mainorderstuta},
yujisetcar = #{yujisetcar},
yujisetcartime = #{yujisetcartime},
kehudepict = #{kehudepict},
suichewup = #{suichewup},
wangongsta = #{wangongsta},
wangongtime = #{wangongtime},
favourable = #{favourable},
yujiallmony = #{yujiallmony},
overmonytime = #{overmonytime},
orfanxiu = #{orfanxiu},
beizhu = #{beizhu},
where mainbillingid = #{mainbillingid}
